action.content:
You are a language wizard who likes to guess words by using the given rules.

Welcome to Wordle! You have six attempts to guess the target word, a valid English word of five lowercase letters (a-z). Please use the tags "explanation:" and "guess:" to provide a concise explanation for each guess.

For instance, if your guess is "apple", your response should be
explanation: this is a common five-letter English word, and I am starting my guess with this word.
guess: apple

After each guess, your answer will be validated, and you will receive feedback indicating which letters are correct (green), which letters are correct but in the wrong position (yellow), and which letters are incorrect (red). This feedback can be useful in determining which letters to include or exclude in your next guess.

For example, the feedback for "apple" might be:
guess_feedback: a<yellow> p<yellow> p<green> l<yellow> e<red>

The explanation should contain details about how the guess_feedback is used to arrive at a new guess.

Do not generate any other text.

Let's begin with your first guess.

explanation: this is a common five-letter English word, and I am starting my guess with this word.  
guess: crane

attempts = 1
target_word = gland
guess = crane
guess_feedback = c<red> r<red> a<green> n<green> e<red>

guess_feedback: c<red> r<red> a<green> n<green> e<red>

Provide your response only in this format.
explanation: details
guess: word

explanation: the letters "a" and "n" are correct and in the right positions (3rd and 4th letters). The letters "c", "r", and "e" are incorrect and should be excluded. I will choose a new word that includes "a" and "n" in the correct positions and avoids the excluded letters.  
guess: slant

attempts = 2
target_word = gland
guess = slant
guess_feedback = s<red> l<green> a<green> n<green> t<red>

guess_feedback: s<red> l<green> a<green> n<green> t<red>

Provide your response only in this format.
explanation: details
guess: word

explanation: the letters "l", "a", and "n" are correct and in the right positions (2nd, 3rd, and 4th letters). The letters "s" and "t" are incorrect and should be excluded. I will choose a new word that includes "l", "a", and "n" in the correct positions and avoids the excluded letters.  
guess: bland

attempts = 3
target_word = gland
guess = bland
guess_feedback = b<red> l<green> a<green> n<green> d<green>

guess_feedback: b<red> l<green> a<green> n<green> d<green>

Provide your response only in this format.
explanation: details
guess: word

explanation: the letters "l", "a", "n", and "d" are correct and in the right positions (2nd, 3rd, 4th, and 5th letters). The letter "b" is incorrect and should be excluded. I will choose a new word that includes "l", "a", "n", and "d" in the correct positions and avoids the excluded letter.  
guess: gland

attempts = 4
target_word = gland
guess = gland
guess_feedback = g<green> l<green> a<green> n<green> d<green>

guess_explanation: this is a common five-letter English word, and I am starting my guess with this word.

the letters "a" and "n" are correct and in the right positions (3rd and 4th letters). The letters "c", "r", and "e" are incorrect and should be excluded. I will choose a new word that includes "a" and "n" in the correct positions and avoids the excluded letters.

the letters "l", "a", and "n" are correct and in the right positions (2nd, 3rd, and 4th letters). The letters "s" and "t" are incorrect and should be excluded. I will choose a new word that includes "l", "a", and "n" in the correct positions and avoids the excluded letters.

the letters "l", "a", "n", and "d" are correct and in the right positions (2nd, 3rd, 4th, and 5th letters). The letter "b" is incorrect and should be excluded. I will choose a new word that includes "l", "a", "n", and "d" in the correct positions and avoids the excluded letter.
